room_title: Escape room "Mine Trap" by Escape Room Park City in Salt Lake City
review: First, we did this as a family; no kids. We did mine shaft. Only 2 out of 6 in our group had ever done one before but we all worked as a team; everyone relying on their own strengths and paired with everyone else’s to figure it out. It was a lot of fun and really requires everyone to participate. A very unique activity and now we’re all hooked! Can’t wait to do another one!

room_title: Escape room "Mine Trap" by Escape Room Park City in Salt Lake City
review: Friend reunion in Park City turned into escaping from a mine shaft. Great fun, much thought put into the clues and design. Highly recommend for a fun event with friends and family.

room_title: Escape room "Mine Trap" by Escape Room Park City in Salt Lake City
review: My partner and I have done at least 30 different escape rooms. Escape Room Park City is one of the best! The rooms and puzzles are great, and the owners and staff are so friendly. Highly recommend the Mine Trap and Travel Room!
